thread.title: DAVID BUTLER
thread.title_full: Personalized Paper Manufacturing Group reviewed by DAVID BUTLER

author: DAVID BUTLER
title: DAVID BUTLER
text: Adjusting the price after the order was placed knocked out that 5th star. I ordered some notepads for $38. After the order was placed, I was told the order was on hold until I approved a surcharge of $7.60. Apparently, a note pad that merely has information is $38, but a notepad that has information with line next to it (eg: Name ___
